title: Randomized Trial of Chemotherapy Versus Chemotherapy Plus Radiotherapy for Stage I-II Hodgkin's Disease
abstract: Journal Article Randomized Trial of Chemotherapy Versus Chemotherapy Plus Radiotherapy for Stage I–II Hodgkin's Disease Get access Santiago Pavlovsky, Santiago Pavlovsky * 3Grupo Argentino de Tratamiento de la Leucemia Aguda (GATLA)Buenos Aires, Argentina *Correspondence to: Dr. Santiago Pavlovsky, Institute de Investigaciones Hematologicas, Pacheco de Melo 3081, (1425) Buenos Aires, Argentina.
